document_data.mainbody:
A shovel was a digging tool that had a curved blade on its end. A very similar tool was the spade. 
The ideal shovel had a four-foot-long wooden handle and a curved metal head with a blunt edge, allowing it to carry soil and not be damaged from cutting into heavy earth. Kara-Tur, and Zakhara Hoes served a similar purpose in breaking up soil, though they were used quite differently.
Auroras Whole Realms Catalogue sold generic and specialized shovels. Basic coal shovels cost 2 gp, gardening and snow shovels cost 3 gp, whilst postholers cost 4 gp each. Small hand spades could be had for only 2 sp.
There were several magical shovels known around the multiverse.
* A mysterious shovel was kept in a chamber of the Hordelands. When touched, the shovel would disappear, having teleported to another chamber and leaving a fireball in its place.
* Shovels could be found on a robe of useful items.
* A miniature version of such a tool was a required material component in casting the dig spell.
In the , the Magister Galeerie Mulurkrath was killed by a shovel to the head.
The symbol of Fireshear was that of a crossed pickaxe, blade, and shovel.
In Zakhara, the Pick and Shovel Corps was a group of ex-slaves that won their freedom. The "shovels" indicated the dwarf members of the corps.
